p: The plant material (fruits of P. tuberculatum Jacq.) was collected at the farm Arajara in the city of Barbalha, State of Ceará, Brazil. The botanical identification was carried out by Professor Dr. Maria Arlene Pessoa da Silva and a voucher specimen was deposited in the Herbarium Caririense Dárdano de Andrade Lima - HCDAL of the Regional University of Cariri - URCA, cataloged under the registration number 10631.
